reference_summary:
Inglourious Basterds [Blu-ray] Brad Pitt (Actor), Mike Myers (Actor), Quentin Tarantino (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure ['Brad Pitt takes no prisoners in Quentin Tarantino’s high-octane WWII revenge fantasy Inglourious Basterds. As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as “The Basterds,” is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich. Bursting with “action, hair-trigger suspense and a machine-gun spray of killer dialogue” (Peter Travers, Rolling Stone), Inglourious Basterds is “another Tarantino masterpiece” (Jake Hamilton, CBS-TV)!'] {'Genre': 'Le commando des batards, DVD Movie, Inglorious Bastards, Military & War, Blu-ray Movie, Quentin Tarantino, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Action & AdventureLe commando des batards, DVD Movie, Inglorious Bastards, Military & War, Blu-ray Movie, Quentin Tarantino, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Action & Adventure See more', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copyMultiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy See more', 'Contributor': 'Hilmar Eichhorn, Ludger Pistor, Richard Sammel, Rod Taylor, Sylvester Groth, Til Schweiger, Enzo G. Great movies Minions [Blu-ray] Sandra Bullock (Actor), Jon Hamm (Actor), Kyle Balda (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['Product Description', 'The Minions, breakout stars from "Despicable Me," are presented in an origin story that showcases their unpredictable personality and physicality, and pairs them with equally memorable human characters. As it turns out, Minions have existed since the beginning of time. They have evolved from single (yellow) cell organisms into the familiar beings we know, and they live for a collective purpose: to seek out and serve the most despicable master they can find. Academy Award winner Sandra Bullock will lead the voice cast of the human characters as Scarlett Overkill, the world\'s reigning super-villain of the 1960s.', 'Set Contains:', 'Includes Dolby Atmos \uf02d Dolby Atmos is a revolutionary new audio technology that transports you into extraordinary entertainment experience. With Dolby Atmos enabled receivers and speaker configurations, sound comes from all directions, including overhead, to create an immersive experience with clarity, richness, details, and depth. With existing home theater systems, you will get a great surround sound experience.'] {'Genre': 'Illumination Entertainment, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Les Mins, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Despicable Me, Comedy, The Minions Picture, Action & Adventure, Minion MovieIllumination Entertainment, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Les Mins, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Despicable Me, Comedy, The Minions Picture, Action & Adventure, Minion Movie See more', 'Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Sandra Bullock, Steve Carell, Jon Hamm, Chris Renaud, Hiroyuki Sanada, Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.03 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35222343', 'Director': 'Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 8, 2015', 'Actors': 'Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud, Steve Carell', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal', 'Number of discs': '2'} Not as funny as I was hoping... profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user enjoys action and adventure films with high suspense and intense storytelling, while steadily cultivating an appreciation for science fiction and fantasy that explore contemporary technological themes. Their interest in animated family films remains cautious, with a critical eye on humor quality.

- **Director Affinity:** Favoring acclaimed filmmakers like Quentin Tarantino and Peter Jackson, the user remains open to animated works with compelling narratives, evidenced by past purchases from notable studios.

- **Actor Favoritism:** Charismatic actors such as Johnny Depp, Paul Bettany, Ian McKellen, and Martin Freeman are favored. Recent interactions indicate a growing interest in versatile actors, particularly those known for voice performances.

- **Format Preference:** They prefer Blu-ray and 3D formats, seeking high-quality viewing experiences that amplify immersion.

- **Technical Awareness:** The user is technically savvy, valuing seamless playback and investing in compatible technologies for an optimal viewing experience.

- **Critical Acumen:** Recent interactions show the user maintains a discerning approach to film quality, as highlighted by a recent negative review of a movie that failed to meet their expectations despite its intriguing premise. This reinforces their demand for strong storytelling and performances and a pronounced differentiation between potential and actual film quality.

Overall, the user's profile reflects a sophisticated and evolving taste in cinema, balancing diverse genre interests with a steadfast focus on quality and depth.
